summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Golf in Mallorca website. All major sections load correctly with expected item counts. Card flip animations work. Reviews sidebar visible with 'Write a Review' functionality opening Google authentication modal.

ui_bugs.issue: Image broken - external URL not loading

console_warnings.issue: React duplicate key warnings for restaurant IDs
console_warnings.note: These restaurants appear to have duplicate IDs in the backend data

passed_tests: All 16 golf courses load with images including Ibiza and Menorca courses
Golf course card flip works - book button visible on hover
Worldwide Golf CTA banner displays with correct greenfee365.com link
All 38 hotels load with category and region badges
54 restaurants load with 11 Michelin star badges
Puerto Portals restaurants found (Yara, Janina, Flanigan's, Ritzi)
36 Cafés & Bars load with category labels
All 12 beach clubs load including Lobster Club
Beach clubs show distance to nearest golf course
Reviews sidebar visible with reviews and ratings
Write a Review button opens modal with Google authentication
Mobile hamburger menu opens with all navigation items
All navigation links work (Golf, Hotels, Restaurants, Cafés & Bars, Beach Clubs, Reviews, Blog, Contact)
action_items: Fix duplicate restaurant IDs in backend: voro, dins-santi-taura, es-verger, izakaya-mallorca, es-fanals
Replace broken Son Xotano hotel image with working URL
critical_code_review_comments: Duplicate keys in restaurant data causing React warnings - check backend PARTNER_OFFERS for duplicate IDs

success_rate.frontend: 98% (all major features working, minor image/key issues)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All sections fully functional. Golf (16 incl Ibiza/Menorca), Hotels (38), Restaurants (54), Cafés & Bars (36), Beach Clubs (12 incl Lobster Club). Card flip animations work. Reviews sidebar with Google auth modal works. Mobile menu works. Minor issues: 1 broken hotel image (Son Xotano), 5 duplicate restaurant keys causing React warnings.
